titleStmt.title: The speech of Patrick Earl of March-mount, &c., His Majesties High Commissioner to the Parliament of Scotland, on Tuesday the nineteenth of July, 1698. The speech of James Viscount of Seafield, Principal Secretary of State, and president to the Parliament of Scotland, on Tuesday the nineteenth of July 1698.
titleStmt.author: Marchmont, Patrick Hume, Earl of, 1641-1724.
Findlater, James Ogilvy, Earl of, 1663-1730. Speech of James Viscount of Seafield ... president to the Parliament of Scotland, on Tuesday the nineteenth of July 1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
